Name: Infinite Circuit
Effect: Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc.A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

Name: Electromagnetic Field
Effect: Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:Increases DEF by 25%.Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

Name: Resonant Thunder
Effect: Increases the Level of Lightning Rose by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Name: Plasma Eruption
Effect: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by Lightning Rose by 1-3.

Name: Electrocute
Effect: Increases the Level of Violet Arc by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Name: Pulsating Witch
Effect: When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Conductive status onto nearby opponents.This effect can only occur once every 5s.
